ThingDef.label: Proximity Mine
ThingDef.description: A landmine that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. It will also explode if an unaware pawn walks over it.

ThingDef.label: Mini Mine
ThingDef.description: A small landmine that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. It will also explode if an unaware pawn walks over it.

ThingDef.label: Mini Mine
ThingDef.description: A small landmine that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. It will also explode if an unaware pawn walks over it.

ThingDef.label: Mini Mine
ThingDef.description: A small landmine that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. It will also explode if an unaware pawn walks over it.

ThingDef.label: Mini Mine
ThingDef.description: A small landmine that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. It will also explode if an unaware pawn walks over it.

ThingDef.label: The Big One
ThingDef.description: A massive barrel filled with explosives. It will detonate if it is damaged in any way. The volatile explosives within discharge harmlessly after 24 hours.

ThingDef.label: Explosive Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Explosive Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Explosive Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Explosive Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Flame Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in an incendiary blaze if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Flame Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in an incendiary blaze if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Flame Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in an incendiary blaze if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Flame Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in an incendiary blaze if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Stun Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in a flash of light if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Stun Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in a flash of light if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Stun Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in a flash of light if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Stun Trap
ThingDef.description: A trap that is designed to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode in a flash of light if it is damaged in any way. The trap is stable if left alone and can be safely walked around; the trap must be damaged to trigger detonation.

ThingDef.label: Mining Explosive
ThingDef.description: A mining explosive. It's set to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if damaged in any way. The explosion deals greatly increased damage to structures and terrain. It can be safely walked around; damage is required to detonate the charge.

ThingDef.label: Mining Explosive
ThingDef.description: A mining explosive. It's set to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if damaged in any way. The explosion deals greatly increased damage to structures and terrain. It can be safely walked around; damage is required to detonate the charge.

ThingDef.label: Mining Explosive
ThingDef.description: A mining explosive. It's set to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if damaged in any way. The explosion deals greatly increased damage to structures and terrain. It can be safely walked around; damage is required to detonate the charge.

ThingDef.label: Mining Explosive
ThingDef.description: A mining explosive. It's set to go off on a hair-trigger and will explode if damaged in any way. The explosion deals greatly increased damage to structures and terrain. It can be safely walked around; damage is required to detonate the charge.

ThingDef.label: Magelight
ThingDef.description: A magelight that provides light in a small area and lasts until deconstructed or destroyed. It is exceedingly fragile; if it is damaged in any way it will explode in a cloud of dust, stunning everything nearby for a short duration.

ThingDef.label: Lucky Lantern
ThingDef.description: A lantern created by a miner. It's exceptionally fragile and will explode in a cloud of dust if damaged, stunning everything in the immediate area.

ThingDef.label: Lucky Lantern
ThingDef.description: A lantern created by a Miner. It's exceptionally fragile and will explode in a cloud of dust if damaged, stunning everything in the immediate area.

ThingDef.label: Lucky Lantern
ThingDef.description: A lantern created by a Miner. It's exceptionally fragile and will explode in a cloud of dust if damaged, stunning everything in the immediate area.

ThingDef.label: Lucky Lantern
ThingDef.description: A lantern created by a Miner. It's exceptionally fragile and will explode in a cloud of dust if damaged, stunning everything in the immediate area.

ThingDef.label: Healing Rock
ThingDef.description: A rock chiseled in an arcane pattern. It heals nearby allies periodically.

ThingDef.label: Lightning Rune
ThingDef.description: A rock chiseled in an arcane pattern. It deals damage to nearby enemies periodically.

ThingDef.label: makeshift column
ThingDef.description: A column that's been quickly constructed from some materials lying around. It's of makeshift construction and is fairly fragile.

ThingDef.label: Unstable Singularity
ThingDef.description: A cold, chaotic singularity that cannot exist for long.

ThingDef.label: Unstable Singularity
ThingDef.description: A cold, chaotic singularity that cannot exist for long.

ThingDef.label: Unstable Singularity
ThingDef.description: A cold, chaotic singularity that cannot exist for long.

ThingDef.label: Unstable Singularity
ThingDef.description: A cold, chaotic singularity that cannot exist for long.

ThingDef.label: Unstable Singularity
ThingDef.description: A cold, chaotic singularity that cannot exist for long.

ThingDef.label: Poison Trap
ThingDef.description: A poison trap. It will explode if an unaware pawn walks over it, coating the area with a noxious gas. Directly adjacent Poison Traps will detonate together, increasing the toxicity of the gas. The trap is not triggered by damage.

ThingDef.label: collapsing column
ThingDef.description: A column that's been quickly constructed from some materials lying around. On top of its makeshift construction, it seems to have been purposely weakened and designed to fall apart -- someone walking near it might just knock it over.

ThingDef.label: Forage
ThingDef.description: Foraging for food.

ThingDef.label: micro-turret
ThingDef.description: A micro-turret with a built-in power source. It has a cheap design, which allows it to be mass-produced and disposable, while still providing good cover-fire for the discerning engineer. It shoots faster than a normal turret, but does less damage.

ThingDef.label: Supply Drop
ThingDef.description: Dropping Supplies!

ThingDef.label: Arcane Minefield
ThingDef.description: Channeling destructive magic to create an arcane minefield.

ThingDef.label: Create Supplies
ThingDef.description: Creating Supplies!

ThingDef.Name: DirtWall
ThingDef.label: arcane wall
ThingDef.description: A magical translucent wall capable of holding a roof.

ThingDef.Name: TempWall
ThingDef.label: arcane wall
ThingDef.description: A magical translucent wall capable of holding a roof.

ThingDef.label: door
ThingDef.description: Divides rooms. Simple doors must be manually opened, which slows people down. The amount of slowdown depends on what the door is made of.
